stochastic_function: lambda team_productivity: {1:0.7,0:0.3,-1:0.0} if team_productivity == 1 else ({1:0.4,0:0.4,-1:0.2} if team_productivity == 0 else {1:0.1,0:0.5,-1:0.4})

lambda investment_decision, development_cost, market_demand, product_success_probability: {1:0.0, 0:1.0, -1:0.0} if investment_decision == 'do not invest' else {1:0.7, 0:0.2, -1:0.1} if development_cost == 1 and market_demand == 1 and product_success_probability == 1 else {1:0.4, 0:0.4, -1:0.2} if product_success_probability == 0 else {1:0.1, 0:0.5, -1:0.4} if product_success_probability == -1 else {1:0.5, 0:0.3, -1:0.2}
